problem.markdown:
Continue to review the Consistency-Data dashboard. Set Data = District; Period = March 2021; Boundary = Other, then District A-3; Disaggregation = Facility; Is the following statement True or False: During the last 12 months, most health facilities of District A-3 reported a higher number of 1st doses of Penta vaccine than 3rd doses of Penta vaccine.
>>Select the one correct answer: (1 attempt)<<
( ) True (x) False
[explanation] The correct answer is False. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Continue to review the Consistency-Data dashboard. Set Data = District; Period = March 2021; Boundary = Other, then District A-3; Disaggregation = Facility;
Is the following statement True or False:
During the last 12 months, most health facilities of District A-3 reported a higher number of 1st doses of Penta vaccine than 3rd doses of Penta vaccine.
